name: Fake/SuperSonia
description: Play angel high school student named Sonia and escape from hell. You can make your own level and share with friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 based graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space
